model.comment: SRC16 is a stationary decoder with serial bus

label.text: Note: Changes to Option CVs are not recognized until SRC16 power is cycled.
Opt4 Enable gateway for DCC commands from track to bus
- Requires bus interface and DCC control to be enabled
Opt5 Enable transmit and receive on bus
Opt6 Enable receiving DCC commands from track
- When disabled, DCC gateway is disabled
Note: In a Digitrax system the bus is called LocoNet

display.tooltip: Required for ops mode
Sets the Ops Mode address

label.text: This is the same as a Loco address
Opt7 Output disabled when corresponding input grounded
Opt8 Enable to invert the drive for all outputs
Opt1 Send input state at power on
Opt2 Send output state at power on
Opt5 Send primary input state at Digitrax interrogation request
Opt4 Send output state at Digitrax interrogation request
Opt5 Send 16 output state at power on

display.tooltip: The decoder version number (read only)

label.text: When a switch (turnout) throw command is issued that matches this address the SRC16 inputs are disabled.
When a close command is issued with this address the inputs are enabled.
This feature is useful for dispatcher control when the SRC16 inputs are used for local turnout control.
To form a group set both outputs to the same address with one to throw and the other to close.
Note: If a sensor message is selected then switch state c and t is used for sensor hi and lo respectively.

label.text: Sets the output state to always be the same at power on
Only applies if Option 2 is selected
Note: If a sensor message is selected to execute a route then
switch state c and t is used for sensor hi and lo respectively.
